landing.title: AI Assistant for Preaching Preparation
landing.subtitle: Capture your thoughts during reflection, convert speech to text, and automatically structure sermons with analysis of conceptual gaps.

featureCards.recordingDescription: Capture thoughts as they occur with automatic cloud saving and speech-to-text conversion.
featureCards.structuringDescription: Automatically improve your text by removing repetitions, forming a coherent flow, and applying stylistic corrections.
featureCards.analysisDescription: Intelligently segment content to identify semantic gaps and imbalances.
